description: A comprehensive matrix identifying, analyzing, and prioritizing potential risks associated with the project. Each risk includes its category, probability, impact, overall priority, and references to mitigation strategies.

riskCategories.name: Market Risks
riskCategories.description: Risks related to market acceptance, competition, and changes in market dynamics.

riskCategories.name: Technical Risks
riskCategories.description: Risks related to technology, development, infrastructure, and security vulnerabilities.

riskCategories.name: Business Operations Risks
riskCategories.description: Risks related to operations, financial stability, legal/regulatory compliance, and resource management.

riskCategories.name: Competitive Risks
riskCategories.description: Risks arising from actions of existing or new competitors.

riskCategories.name: Strategic Risks
riskCategories.description: Risks related to long-term goals, strategic decisions, and external strategic shifts.

impactLevels.label: Insignificant
impactLevels.description: Minimal or no impact on project objectives, cost, or schedule.

impactLevels.label: Minor
impactLevels.description: Slight impact, requiring minor adjustments or causing minor delays/cost increases.

impactLevels.label: Moderate
impactLevels.description: Noticeable impact, requiring significant adjustments or causing moderate delays/cost increases.

impactLevels.label: Major
impactLevels.description: Substantial impact, potentially threatening project success, major delays/cost increases.

impactLevels.label: Catastrophic
impactLevels.description: Severe impact, leading to project failure or extreme consequences.

risks.riskName: Example Market Risk: Low User Adoption
risks.description: The target users may not adopt the product as quickly or widely as anticipated.
Unauthorized access to sensitive data or system disruption due to security vulnerabilities.
potentialImpacts: Reputational damage and loss of customer trust.

riskMonitoringPlan.frequency: e.g., Monthly, Quarterly, Ad-hoc based on triggers
riskMonitoringPlan.responsibleParty: Team/Individual responsible for ongoing risk monitoring.
riskMonitoringPlan.reportingProcess: How risks will be reported and escalated.
